Asha Mwilu bụ onye nta akụkọ Kenya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri. Ọ bụ onye Chevening Scholar na Mahadum maka Creative Arts, Farnham. N'afọ 2016, ọ bụrụ onye mmeri nke CNN Multichoice African Journalist of the year Awards, ma merie na News Impact category nke kachasị ewu ewu na Kọntinent.
Ọ gụrụ Broadcast Journalism na Mahadum United States International ma nwee nzere Masters of Art in Documentary Practices (Distinction) site na Mahaduma maka Creative Arts.

Ọ malitere ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya na June 2010 dị ka Onye isi akụkọ na One FM Kenya wee kwaga Kenya Television Network (KTN) n'etiti Disemba 2011 ruo June 2015, na August 2015, ọ sonyeere KTN News dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nta akụkọ onwe ya na n'April 2018, ọ sonye na Citizen TV dị ka onye nchịkọta ọrụ pụrụ iche.
